project.name: Citation Style Language (CSL) citation styles
project.description: Citation Style Language (CSL) citation styles packaged as a Maven artifact. This is a fork of the styles repo, with: 1, some changes for NCBI's citation exporter, and 2, a POM added, that was adapted from the one generated by Michel Kraemer.

license.name: Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license
license.comments: All the styles in this repository are released under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license. For attribution, any software using CSL styles from this repository must include a clear mention of the CSL project and a link to CitationStyles.org. When distributing these styles, the listings of authors and contributors in the style metadata must be kept as is.
